page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: At Collier St. fete people who lived in our area also told us the activities they enjoyed in other places: sailing on Bewl Bridge reservoir; golf at Cranbrook; motor racing at Brans Hatch and a craft centre for the disabled at Yalding. A gardening club has recently been started in our area. They hope to meet monthly. Most people in our area have a freezer for local produce as well as the fruit & vegetables they grow themselves. One lady told us what she grew in her garden."I grow raspberries, potatoes, onions, carrots, parsley, parsnips, cabbages, cauliflowers, brussels sprouts and this year I am trying to grow garlic. As a result of the produce stall I had at the fete I now have a herb garden! People are really going in for old fashioned roses and herbs again in the village."
